str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
